content.question: The graph above shows a firm's cost and revenue curves. This profit-maximizing firm will

choices.label: charge a higher price than that necessary to maximize revenues
have many profit-maximizing price and quantity combinations
be unable to increase sales and total revenues by lowering its price
never have a region of falling average total cost

content.answer: charge a higher price than that necessary to maximize revenues
